Drop folder here or click to select: Tụba folda ebe a ma ọ bụ pịa ịhọrọ
Click the button below or drag a folder: Pịa bọtịnụ dị n'okpuru ma ọ bụ dọrọ folda ebe a
Total in history: Ngụkọta na akụkọ ihe mere eme
No images found in selected folder and s: Ahụghị foto ọ bụla na folda ahọpụtara na subfolders
Enweghị foto iji gosi. Họrọ folda.
Try using B, V, H, R, and G keys to expe: Gbalịa iji igodo B, V, H, R, na G iji nwalee mmetụta na logo.
All images have been viewed. Starting ov: E lere foto niile anya. Na-amalite ọzọ.
Press Space to start new session: Pịa Space iji malite nnọkọ ọhụrụ
File is already deleted or inaccessible: E ehichapụla faịlụ ma ọ bụ enweghị ike ịnweta
Are you sure you want to move the file t: Ị ji n'aka na ịchọrọ ibuga faịlụ ahụ na ahịhịa?
Failed to move file to trash: Emeghị ka faịlụ gaa na ahịhịa
No more valid images found in the folder: Ahụghị foto ndị ọzọ dị irè na folda.
About GestArt Text:
GestArt bụ ihe ngosi foto emebere iji nyere ndị na-ese ihe aka ịmụta gesture drawing, sketch poses, na ile foto ntụaka anya.

Ọtụtụ afọ, m na-eji mmemme ọzọ ma enweghị afọ ojuju na akụkụ ụfọdụ. Eziokwu bụ na, amaghị m otú esi koodu n'onwe m. M nọrọ ọtụtụ ọnwa na-agba mgba na AI, nke na-emebikarị mmemme ahụ kpamkpam, mana ugbu a ị nwere mmemme a nke AI dere dabere na echiche m. O kpebiri ime mmemme ahụ kpamkpam open-source, n'efu iji, kesaa na gbanwee.

Ekele: Echiche - LeonWGal; Koodu - Cursor; Ụda countdown - Mixkit; Icons - Tabler

N'okpuru bụ njikọ m ebe ị nwere ike ịkpọtụrụ m ma ọ bụ kwado m. Ekwesịrị m ịdọ aka ná ntị na m bụ onye na-ese ihe NSFW, yabụ biko kpachara anya.
Instructions Text:
Njikwa Ndị Dị Mkpa:
• Space - Kwụsịtụ/Maliteghachi timer
• Aka ekpe/Aka nri arrows - Foto gara aga/Na-esote
• S - Gafere foto ugbu a
• Delete - Buga foto ugbu a na ahịhịa

Iji Foto Emebi:
• Mouse wheel ma ọ bụ +/- - Zoom in/out
• Pịa na dọrọ - Pan mgbe zoom
• B - Ihe nzacha oji na ọcha
• V - Tụgharịa kwụ ọtọ
• H - Tụgharịa kwụ ọtọ
• R - Tụgharịa 90°
• Backspace - Tọgharịa mmetụta foto niile

Atụmatụ Ndị Ọzọ:
• G - Gbanwee grid nhazi
• T - Gosi/Zoo timer
• A - Gbanwee 'Mgbe niile n'elu'
• O - Mepee foto ugbu a
• C - Detuo foto na clipboard
• Ctrl+, - Mepee ntuziaka
